title: chris ware sans serif fonts
content:
Hi,  
I'm looking for fonts that will look like Chris ware's sans serif lettering work.  
like here:

[http://drawn.ca/wordpress/wp-content/images/comicspanel.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307093231/http:/drawn.ca/wordpress/wp-content/images/comicspanel.jpg "http://drawn.ca/wordpress/wp-content/images/comicspanel.jpg")  
 [http://www.sparehed.com/wp-content/uploads/2007/05/ware-lambiek00b.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307093231/http:/www.sparehed.com/wp-content/uploads/2007/05/ware-lambiek00b.jpg "http://www.sparehed.com/wp-content/uploads/2007/05/ware-lambiek00b.jpg")  
 [http://cartoonbank.com/newyorker/061127on\_ware\_4.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307093231/http:/cartoonbank.com/newyorker/061127on_ware_4.gif "http://cartoonbank.com/newyorker/061127on\_ware\_4.gif")

I don't actually need the handwriting look but rather the sans serif style of them.

What would you suggest?
author: uriash

comments.content: "A COMICS PANEL" looks like it's based on Futura. [Router](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307093231/http:/www.vllg.com/Incubator/Router/mudTyper+Weights/) might be a good alternative, but since they are handlettered you won't have all the irregularities.

Dave Farey's [ITC Highlander](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307093231/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-highlander/), based on Oz Cooper's lettering, has a certain handlettered quality, without the cartoon irregularities.

BTW, your middle link rejects opening the page, so I couldn't see that one.

- Mike Yanega

Tnx Chris and Mike. I'm looking for something a bit more modern. Highlander looks cool but it has to much of a classic touch. Router is too rounded and has less of the slight handwriting allusion that I'm looking for.

Have a look at the samples in [Part 6 of the Script Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307093231/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/Script06Pg1.html). You might see something in the lettering there.

- Mike Yanega

You might find something closer amongst fonts based on architects' lettering.

[ITC Stylus](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307093231/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-stylus/)  
 [Architect Small Block](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307093231/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/quietdesigns/architect-small-block/)  
 [Simpliciter Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307093231/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/larstornqvist/simpliciter-sans/)  
 [Tekton](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307093231/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/tekton/)
